>>> total = 0
>>> for i in range(1, 20):
...     takes = 100 * (30/i/100)
...     print(f"Depth {i} takes {takes}")
...     total += takes
...     print(total)
...
Depth 1 takes 30.0
30.0
Depth 2 takes 15.0
45.0
Depth 3 takes 10.0
55.0
Depth 4 takes 7.5
62.5
Depth 5 takes 6.0
68.5
Depth 6 takes 5.0
73.5
Depth 7 takes 4.285714285714286
77.78571428571429

81.53571428571429
Depth 9 takes 3.3333333333333335

Depth 10 takes 3.0
87.86904761904762

90.59632034632035
